sentences.en: Be humbled before the Lord, and He will exalt you.
sentences.cn: 10你们要在主面前降卑, 主就必叫你们升高.

sentences.en: But it can also inspire and uplift and exalt, because power can be used to help people accomplish marvelous things.
sentences.cn: 但是，权力也可以激励人、振奋人和提升人，因为它可以帮助人们成就非同寻常的事业。

sentences.en: Esteem her, and she will exalt you; embrace her, and she will honor you.
sentences.cn: 8高举智慧, 他就使你 高升 .怀抱智慧, 他就使你尊荣.

sentences.en: For you are their glory and strength, and by your favor you exalt our horn.
sentences.cn: 17你是他们力量的荣耀.因为你喜悦我们 、 我们的角必被高举.

sentences.en: If you are not victorious, do not exalt yourself over the vanquished.
sentences.cn: 如果你不是个得胜者, 不要高举你自己于被征服者之上.

sentences.en: It will be the lowliest of kingdoms and will again exalt itself above the other nations.
sentences.cn: 必为列国中最低微的,也不再自高于列国之上.

sentences.en: Jas. 4:10 Be humbled before the Lord, and He will exalt you.
sentences.cn: 雅四10你们要在主面前降卑, 主就必叫你们升高.

sentences.en: Many people are too swamped that they exalt shopping online.
sentences.cn: 很多人都太忙了,他们更喜欢网上购物.

sentences.en: Prize her, and she will exalt you; She will honor you if you embrace her.
sentences.cn: 箴4:8高举 智慧 、 他就使你高升.怀抱智慧、他就使你尊荣.

sentences.en: Remember that you should exalt His work, Of which men have sung.
sentences.cn: 伯36:24你不可忘记称赞他所行的为大 、 就是人所歌颂的.

sentences.en: Result Holistic nursing exalt the value and function for nursing care to auto - dental immediate transplantation.
sentences.cn: 结果整体护理模式提升了护患关系,使护士在自体牙即刻移植中发挥了主体能动作用.

sentences.en: She thanked the President to exalt her.
To dance, clap hands, exalt , shout, skip, roll on, float on.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈, 鼓掌, 兴奋, 欢叫, 跳跃,飘飘当当, 滚滚向前.

sentences.en: To dance, clap hands, exalt, shout, skip, roll on, on.
sentences.cn: 跳舞, 拍手, 跃升, 高叫, 跳跃, 翻滚, 飘浮.

sentences.en: To give glory , honor, or high praise to; exalt.
sentences.cn: 改变的行为为了晋升或 壮丽.

words.tran_cn: 得意洋洋，欣喜；提拔；举起
高举；赞扬；使激动（exalt的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to put someone or something into a high rank or position

trans.tran_cn: 提高，提升，赞扬，使得意，加强
trans.tran_en: to put someone or something into a high rank or position
